citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1130 am on
12-SEP-18.
There was no answer to a knock on the door. A family member in an adjacent home informed APHIS Official that
the licensee would be unavailable for inspection that day. No other authorized representative was available for
inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1130 am on
12-SEP-18.
There was no answer to a knock on the door.  A family member in an adjacent home informed APHIS Official that
the licensee would be unavailable for inspection that day.  No other authorized representative was available for
inspection.
